snippet: Rangers, one half of the Glasgow “Old Firm” that has dominated Scottish football for decades, began their new era in the fourth tier of the game with an unconvincing 2-2 draw Saturday.
abstract: Rangers need a 90th-minute goal to earn a 2-2 draw at Peterhead in its first match outside the top tier of Scottish soccer.
lead_paragraph: Rangers, one half of the Glasgow “Old Firm” that has dominated Scottish football for decades, began their new era in the fourth tier of the game with an unconvincing 2-2 draw Saturday.

headline.seo: Rangers Draw in First Game in Scottish Soccer’s Bottom Tier
headline.main: New Embarrassment for Scotland’s Rangers Is Averted
